title_cn: 自上而下自下而上：有机物控制

title_cn: 活性合金纳米线

title_cn: 新材料制止流血

title_cn: 超半导体纳米线

title_cn: 在墙上的另一块砖

title_cn: “死亡层”的新生活

title: Electron transport in molecular junctions
title_cn: 分子结中的电子传输
abstract: Building an electronic device using individual molecules is one of the ultimate goals in nanotechnology. To achieve this it will be necessary to measure, control and understand electron transport through molecules attached to electrodes. Substantial progress has been made over the past decade and we present here an overview of some of the recent advances. Topics covered include molecular wires, two-terminal switches and diodes, three-terminal transistor-like devices and hybrid devices that use various different signals (light, magnetic fields, and chemical and mechanical signals) to control electron transport in molecules. We also discuss further issues, including molecule–electrode contacts, local heating- and current-induced instabilities, stochastic fluctuations and the development of characterization tools.
abstract_cn: 使用单个分子构建电子设备是纳米技术的最终目标之一。 为此，有必要测量，控制和理解通过附着在电极上的分子进行的电子传输。 在过去的十年中取得了实质性的进展，在此我们概述一些最新的进展。 涵盖的主题包括分子线，两个端子的开关和二极管，类似于三个端子的晶体管的器件以及使用各种不同信号（光，磁场以及化学和机械信号）控制分子中电子传输的混合器件。 我们还将讨论进一步的问题，包括分子的电极接触，局部加热和电流引起的不稳定性，随机波动以及表征工具的开发。

title: Experimental realization of suspended atomic chains composed of different atomic species
title_cn: 由不同原子组成的悬浮原子链的实验实现
abstract: Research into nanostructured materials frequently relates to pure substances. This contrasts with industrial applications, where chemical doping or alloying is often used to enhance the electrical or mechanical properties of materials. However, the controlled preparation of doped nanomaterials has been much more difficult than expected because the increased surface-area-to-volume ratio can, for instance, lead to the expulsion of impurities (self-purification). For nanostructured alloys, the influence of growth methods and the atomic structure on self-purification is still open to investigation. Here, we explore, experimentally and with molecular dynamics simulations, to what extent alloying persists in the limit that a binary metal is mechanically stretched to a linear chain of atoms. Our results reveal a gradual evolution of the arrangement of the different atomic elements in the narrowest region of the chain, where impurities may be expelled to the surface or enclosed during elongation.
abstract_cn: 对纳米结构材料的研究通常涉及纯物质。这与工业应用形成对比，在工业应用中，通常使用化学掺杂或合金化来增强材料的电气或机械性能。然而，掺杂的纳米材料的受控制备比预期的要困难得多，因为增加的表面积/体积比可能例如导致杂质的排出（自纯化）。对于纳米结构合金，生长方法和原子结构对自纯化的影响尚待研究。在这里，我们通过实验和分子动力学模拟探索合金化在多大程度上持续存在的极限，即二元金属被机械拉伸成原子的线性链。我们的结果揭示了链最窄区域中不同原子元素排列的逐渐演变，在延伸过程中杂质可能被排出到表面或被封闭。

title: Epitaxial growth of silicon nanowires using an aluminium catalyst
title_cn: 使用铝催化剂外延生长硅纳米线
abstract: Silicon nanowires have been identified as important components for future electronic and sensor nanodevices. So far gold has dominated as the catalyst for growing Si nanowires via the vapour–liquid–solid (VLS) mechanism. Unfortunately, gold traps electrons and holes in Si and poses a serious contamination problem for Si complementary metal oxide semiconductor (CMOS) processing. Although there are some reports on the use of non-gold catalysts for Si nanowire growth, either the growth requires high temperatures and/or the catalysts are not compatible with CMOS requirements. From a technological standpoint, a much more attractive catalyst material would be aluminium, as it is a standard metal in Si process lines. Here we report for the first time the epitaxial growth of Al-catalysed Si nanowires and suggest that growth proceeds via a vapour–solid–solid (VSS) rather than a VLS mechanism. It is also found that the tapering of the nanowires can be strongly reduced by lowering the growth temperature.
abstract_cn: 硅纳米线已经被确定为未来电子和传感器纳米设备的重要组件。到目前为止，金已通过蒸气固液（VLS）机制成为生长Si纳米线的催化剂。不幸的是，金将电子和空穴捕获在Si中，并给Si互补金属氧化物半导体（CMOS）处理带来了严重的污染问题。尽管有一些关于将非金催化剂用于Si纳米线生长的报道，但是要么生长需要高温和/或催化剂与CMOS要求不兼容。从技术角度来看，更具吸引力的催化剂材料是铝，因为它是Si生产线中的标准金属。在这里，我们首次报告了Al催化的Si纳米线的外延生长，并表明生长是通过蒸气（solid）（VSS）而不是VLS机制进行的。还发现通过降低生长温度可以大大降低纳米线的锥度。

title: Programmable self-assembly of metal ions inside artificial DNA duplexes
title_cn: 人工DNA双链体内金属离子的可编程自组装
abstract: The ultimate bottom-up approach for the construction of functional nanosystems requires the precise arrangement of atoms and molecules in three dimensions. DNA is currently one of the most prominent molecules able to self-assemble into complex networks and is therefore regarded as the ‘silicon of the nano-world’. Metals and metal ions, in contrast, are the atomic building-blocks needed in such materials to establish functions such as electrical conductivity or magnetism. Here we report a new concept, which efficiently combines metal ions and DNA. The DNA structure is used as a matrix to program robustly the complexation of different metal ions under precise control with regard to element, number and composition.
abstract_cn: 构建功能纳米系统的最终自下而上的方法要求原子和分子在三个维度上的精确排列。 DNA是目前能够自我组装成复杂网络的最杰出分子之一，因此被视为纳米世界的“硅”。 相反，金属和金属离子是此类材料中建立诸如电导率或磁性之类的功能所需的原子构件。 在这里，我们报告了一个新概念，该概念有效地结合了金属离子和DNA。 以DNA结构为基质，可以在元素，数量和组成的精确控制下，对不同金属离子的络合进行有力的编程。

title: Controlled patterning of aligned self-assembled peptide nanotubes
title_cn: 对齐的自组装肽纳米管的受控图案
abstract: Controlling the spatial organization of objects at the nanoscale is a key challenge in enabling their technological application. Biomolecular assemblies are attractive nanostructures owing to their biocompatibility, straightforward chemical modifiability, inherent molecular recognition properties and their availability for bottom-up fabrication. Aromatic peptide nanotubes are self-assembled nanostructures with unique physical and chemical stability and remarkable mechanical rigidity. Their application in the fabrication of metallic nanowires and in the improvement of the sensitivity of electrochemical biosensors have already been demonstrated. Here we show the formation of a vertically aligned nanoforest by axial unidirectional growth of a dense array of these peptide tubes. We also achieved horizontal alignment of the tubes through noncovalent coating of the tubes with a ferrofluid and the application of an external magnetic field. Taken together, our results demonstrate the ability to form a two-dimensional dense array of nanotube assemblies with either vertical or horizontal patterns.
abstract_cn: 在纳米技术上控制对象的空间组织是实现其技术应用的关键挑战。生物分子组装体由于其生物相容性，直接的化学修饰性，固有的分子识别特性以及自下而上的可利用性而成为有吸引力的纳米结构。芳香族肽纳米管是自组装的纳米结构，具有独特的物理和化学稳定性以及出色的机械刚度。已经证明了它们在金属纳米线的制造中以及在电化学生物传感器的灵敏度提高中的应用。在这里，我们通过这些肽管的密集阵列的轴向单向生长显示了垂直排列的纳米森林的形成。我们还通过用铁磁流体对管子进行非共价涂覆并施加了外部磁场，实现了管子的水平对准。综上所述，我们的结果证明了形成具有垂直或水平图案的二维纳米管组件致密阵列的能力。

title: Controlled buckling of semiconductor nanoribbons for stretchable electronics
title_cn: 可拉伸电子器件的半导体纳米带的受控屈曲
abstract: Control over the composition, shape, spatial location and/or geometrical configuration of semiconductor nanostructures is important for nearly all applications of these materials. Here we report a mechanical strategy for creating certain classes of three-dimensional shapes in nanoribbons that would be difficult to generate in other ways. This approach involves the combined use of lithographically patterned surface chemistry to provide spatial control over adhesion sites, and elastic deformations of a supporting substrate to induce well-controlled local displacements. We show that precisely engineered buckling geometries can be created in nanoribbons of GaAs and Si in this manner and that these configurations can be described quantitatively with analytical models of the mechanics. As one application example, we show that some of these structures provide a route to electronics (and optoelectronics) with extremely high levels of stretchability (up to ∼100%), compressibility (up to ∼25%) and bendability (with curvature radius down to ∼5 mm).
abstract_cn: 对于半导体材料的几乎所有应用，控制半导体纳米结构的组成，形状，空间位置和/或几何构型都很重要。在这里，我们报告了一种机械策略，用于在纳米带中创建某些类别的三维形状，而这些形状很难以其他方式生成。该方法涉及光刻图案化的表面化学的组合使用，以提供对粘合部位的空间控制，以及支撑基板的弹性变形，以引起受控的局部位移。我们表明，可以以这种方式在GaAs和Si的纳米带中创建经过精确设计的屈曲几何形状，并且可以使用力学分析模型对这些配置进行定量描述。作为一个应用示例，我们表明其中一些结构提供了通往电子产品（和光电产品）的途径，这些产品具有极高的可拉伸性（高达＆＃8764; 100％），可压缩性（高达＆＃8764; 25％）和可弯曲性（曲率半径低至＆＃8764; 5毫米）。</ p>

title: Ge/Si nanowire mesoscopic Josephson junctions
title_cn: Ge / Si纳米线介观约瑟夫森结
abstract: The controlled growth of nanowires (NWs) with dimensions comparable to the Fermi wavelengths of the charge carriers allows fundamental investigations of quantum confinement phenomena. Here, we present studies of proximity-induced superconductivity in undoped Ge/Si core/shell NW heterostructures contacted by superconducting leads. By using a top gate electrode to modulate the carrier density in the NW, the critical supercurrent can be tuned from zero to greater than 100 nA. Furthermore, discrete sub-bands form in the NW due to confinement in the radial direction, which results in stepwise increases in the critical current as a function of gate voltage. Transport measurements on these superconductor–NW–superconductor devices reveal high-order (n = 25) resonant multiple Andreev reflections, indicating that the NW channel is smooth and the charge transport is highly coherent. The ability to create and control coherent superconducting ordered states in semiconductor–superconductor hybrid nanostructures allows for new opportunities in the study of fundamental low-dimensional superconductivity.
abstract_cn: 尺寸可与电荷载流子的费米波长相当的纳米线（NWs）的受控生长允许对量子限制现象进行基础研究。在这里，我们介绍了由超导引线接触的未掺杂Ge / Si核/壳NW异质结构中邻近感应超导性的研究。通过使用顶栅电极调制NW中的载流子密度，可以将临界超电流从零调整到大于100 nA。此外，由于径向上的限制，在NW中形成了离散的子带，这导致临界电流作为栅极电压的函数逐步增加。在这些超导体NW超导体器件上的传输测量结果显示出高阶（n＆＃160; =＆＃160; 25）共振的多个Andreev反射，表明NW通道是平滑的并且电荷传输是高度相干的。在半导体超导体混合纳米结构中创建和控制相干超导有序态的能力为基础低维超导性研究提供了新的机会。

title: Rapid and label-free nanomechanical detection of biomarker transcripts in human RNA
title_cn: 快速，无标签的纳米机械检测人RNA中的生物标志物
abstract: The availability of entire genome sequences has triggered the development of microarrays for clinical diagnostics that measure the expression levels of specific genes. Methods that involve labelling can achieve picomolar detection sensitivity, but they are costly, labour-intensive and time-consuming. Moreover, target amplification or biochemical labelling can influence the original signal. We have improved the biosensitivity of label-free cantilever-array sensors by orders of magnitude to detect mRNA biomarker candidates in total cellular RNA. Differential gene expression of the gene 1-8U, a potential marker for cancer progression or viral infections, has been observed in a complex background. The measurements provide results within minutes at the picomolar level without target amplification, and are sensitive to base mismatches. This qualifies the technology as a rapid method to validate biomarkers that reveal disease risk, disease progression or therapy response. We foreseee cantilever arrays being used as a tool to evaluate treatment response efficacy for personalized medical diagnostics.
abstract_cn: 整个基因组序列的可用性触发了用于临床诊断的微阵列的开发，该阵列可测量特定基因的表达水平。涉及标记的方法可以达到皮摩尔检测灵敏度，但是它们昂贵，费力且费时。而且，靶标扩增或生化标记会影响原始信号。我们已将无标记悬臂阵列传感器的生物敏感性提高了几个数量级，以检测总细胞RNA中的mRNA生物标志物候选物。已经在复杂的背景中观察到了基因1-8U（可能是癌症进展或病毒感染的潜在标记）的差异基因表达。测量结果可在几分钟内以皮摩尔级水平提供结果，而无需扩增靶标，并且对碱基错配敏感。这使该技术有资格作为一种快速方法来验证揭示疾病风险，疾病进展或治疗反应的生物标志物。我们预见到悬臂阵列将用作评估针对个人医学诊断的治疗反应功效的工具。

title: This Issue
title_cn: 这个问题
